The State Theatre  W PERIOD College Ave. announced that alternative rock group Echo and the Bunnymen canceled its tour dates including the concert scheduled for Nov PERIOD  PERIOD

The venue is offering a refund for show credit to those who already bought tickets according to the State Theatre Web site PERIOD

One can obtain the refund by showing a valid ID and a credit card in the same name PERIOD
